CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 22, 1945 reads: "For A Worthy Cause - Right - This is the time of year when everyone is asked to contribute generously to the Tuberculosis League fund and the town's young people are doing their part . Here, some of the girls taking part in drive, receive donations from their schoolmates. Christmas seals cost only a penny a piece and hundreds of people benefit from this drive.  Are you giving you share? - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Two young women selling Christmas seals for Tuberculosis League to man, and woman wearing fur jacket, standing on snow covered sidewalk
